Glad you made it here!

Ponicode currently supports the following languages:

  • TypeScript (Beta)
  • JavaScript (CommonJS, ES6, Node, JSX) (Alpha)
  • Python (Alpha)

If you want to know more about Ponicode, check out the Ponicode Documentation.

Get started with Ponicode Unit Tests

Ponicode helps you generate your unit tests in a few clicks, without having to worry about syntax.

Just open a TypeScript, JavaScript or Python file, look for a Pony icon on the left of your functions and get started! For your first test, we recommend choosing a pure function.

Check out this video for a quick tutorial ðŸ‘‡.

For more video tutorials on how to use Ponicode Unit Tests, check out the Ponicode Youtube channel.
